long_description: The Timbuk2 Blackbird daypack may be minimalist urban chic on the outside, but it's packed with organizational wizardry on the inside. It has dedicated pockets for your laptop, tablet and smartphone. Easy-access main compartment includes a padded laptop compartment that holds up to a 15 in. laptop; also includes a separate fabric-lined tablet slip pocket. Easy-access, side smartphone pocket is lined with soft tricot fabric and has a weatherproof port for headphone cord routing. Front organizer pocket holds i-gadets, cables, powerbrick, pens and other necessities. Stretchy external side pocket holds a water bottle or your U-lock (sold separately). Top grab handle; blinky light loop (light sold separately). The Timbuk2 Blackbird daypack has adjustable, padded shoulder straps, a sternum strap and a padded and ventilated back panel.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Blackbird daypack may be minimalist urban chic on the outside, but it's packed with organizational wizardry on the inside. It has dedicated pockets for your laptop, tablet and smartphone.
